Notice

Example notice component.

Usage

Open this example in a new window 

  <div class="notice">
    <div class="notice__media">
      <img class="notice__img" src="..." alt="">
    </div>
    <div class="notice__body">
      <div class="notice__title">...</div>
      <div class="notice__text">
        ...
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="notice__footer">
      <a class="button" href="#">...</a>
    </div>
  </div>
